attributes.action: Stop promoting a MAN on packet of Tampons.
attributes.additional_details: I would like you to support me on this and have his face removed please for woman alone
attributes.background: There is a man’s face on a box of tampons he’s promoting periods this is not only belittling for  woman it’s inappropriate and gives a misconception of what the human body is about and what woman go through it needs removing and should of never been put on there in the first place.

rejection.details: The Government or Parliament is not responsible for an individual company's product marketing.
